title: No draven heads
body: I just logged on to play and I see no {{champion:119}}  heads on anyone can some one help?

replies.body: why do you want the dumb draven heads anyway

Heya! 

These are only available in Normal **Blind** Pick, ARAM and Twisted Treeline.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jGaecQ7p,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:38:27.528+0000)
>
> Heya! 
> 
> These are only available in Normal **Blind** Pick, ARAM and Twisted Treeline.

I don't like playing blind pick and those other modes don't drop key fragments...
they are only in blind pick ranked draft n aram
I just played a norm draft game with no heads.
Blind Pick Normals, ARAM, and Twisted Treeline o.o soo unno
